phrs.translation: 谁是真凶, 谁干的, 凶手

sentences.sentence: "Lush Life" is a rare book-a fast-paced whodunnit with literary heft.
sentences.translation: 《华丽的生活》是一本难得一见的书——一本具有文学价值的悬疑小说。

sentences.sentence: People hate spoilers, especially when they reveal the endings of a whodunnit.
sentences.translation: 人们讨厌剧透，尤其是侦探悬疑小说的结局。

sentences.sentence: If so, you were able to put critical and analytical thinking to work by taking note of all the details provided and sorting them out to determine "whodunnit".
sentences.translation: 如果做过，那么你就具有从记录的笔记中对细节进行整理归纳，然后抽丝剥茧最终破解谜团的严密逻辑思维能力。
